data.text:
Real Property Disposal Case Files for Illinois, Indiana, Michigan, Minnesota, Ohio, and Wisconsin

National Archives Identifier 1179352

These records were regionalized in June 1993 from NARA, Washington to the National Archives--Great Lakes Region, Chicago.

Arranged alphabetically by firm or other property name. In addition to firm or other property name and name of city, Plancor numbers are shown if known.

Notes:

Files for some firms/properties are contained in two or more boxes.

Some firms/properties have more than one Plancor number.

Records for some firms/properties consist only of divider cards, i.e. no documents are in file, e.g. Acme Freight Lines, Inc. in Box 1.

Some divider cards refer one to other files, e.g. Aircraft Assembly Plant #7 in Box 4.

More files are received annually. Please contact the National Archives at Chicago for the most updated file list.
